channel.title: Don't you just wanna play the old school moparscape again?
channel.description:
Remember the old moparscape of 2006/2007 where you would start off in the east bank varrock and you would train in the dummy room by hitting the dummies for attack, clicking the door for strength, and searching the hay bales for defence? Remember running across from the bank to the dummy room and trying to get there before someone would pk you because it was a pk-anywhere server? Remember all of the shops being in the dummy room where partyhats, santas, and masks were max cash? Then your main money-making source was the tea stalls east of the bank? Then you would want moderator on it but the owner was never on at all? Then the server would shut down a week later like it never even existed because the person running it was most likely a 10 year old kid?
I miss the old days. That was when it mattered.

item.title: Don't you just wanna play the old school moparscape again?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:2, topic:295147”]yeah i remember playing a server called kindomscape
started in varrock,very basic…
i miss those servers now 70%+ of the servers are delta :([/quote]
That was like the best old-school private server I remember. The other ones were boring.
Edit: Wait, the one I remember had Falador as the main city.

Read full topic
item.source: Don't you just wanna play the old school moparscape again?

item.title: Don't you just wanna play the old school moparscape again?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

lesterknome:

Wow… We get 3 of these threads a day, we get it; they are awesome.

If everyone likes them so much then how come no one remakes any of them? It’s should not be too hard, just make the whole world PvP except for 2 squares and take away all the stupid new PvP armor and weapons.

Read full topic

item.title: Don't you just wanna play the old school moparscape again?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Epic ^^

First server I played was Enkrona. I remember playing with my friend for the 1st time, he went to varrock and killed a lesser demon and it dropped like, d legs i think. I was like “OMFG!, no way dude i bet ur lieing!”, I went there and OMFG D LEGS! LEL.

Yeah, I loved the old moparscape. I couldn’t get enough of it.

Read full topic
